00019 #ifndef _perseus_control_hpp_cm120317_
00020 #define _perseus_control_hpp_cm120317_
00021 
00022 #include <boost/property_tree/ptree.hpp>
00023 
00024 #include "libusb1.0/libusb1.hpp"
00025 #include "logging.hpp"
00026 
00027 namespace Perseus {
00028 
00029   // Microtelecom product id data structure
00030   class product_id {
00031   public:
00032     product_id()
00033       : _sn(0)
00034       , _prodcode(0)
00035       , _hwrel(0)
00036       , _hwver(0) {
00037       for (size_t i=0; i<6; ++i)
00038         _signature[i] = 0;
00039     }
00040     boost::uint16_t sn() const { return _sn; }
00041     boost::uint16_t prodcode() const { return _prodcode; }
00042     boost::uint8_t  hwrel() const { return _hwrel; }
00043     boost::uint8_t  hwver() const { return _hwver; }
00044 
00045     std::string signature() const { 
00046       return str(boost::format("%02hX%02X-%02X%02X-%02X%02X")
00047                  % int(_signature[5]) % int(_signature[4])
00048                  % int(_signature[3]) % int(_signature[2])
00049                  % int(_signature[1]) % int(_signature[0]));
00050       }
00051     std::string to_str() const {
00052       return str(boost::format("%05d-%s 0x%04X v%d.%d") % sn() % signature()
00053                  % prodcode() % int(hwrel()) % int(hwver()));
00054     }
00055   private:
00056     boost::uint16_t  _sn;             // Receiver Serial Number
00057     boost::uint16_t  _prodcode;       // Microtelecom Product Code
00058     boost::uint8_t   _hwrel;          // Product release
00059     boost::uint8_t   _hwver;          // Product version
00060     boost::uint8_t   _signature[6];   // Microtelecom Original Product Signature
00061   } __attribute__((__packed__));
00062     
00063 
00064   class callback : private boost::noncopyable {
00065   public:
00066     typedef boost::shared_ptr<callback> sptr;
00067     virtual ~callback() {}
00068     
00069     virtual void operator()(unsigned char* data, size_t length) {}
00070   } ;
00071 
00072   class receiver_control : private boost::noncopyable {
00073   public:
00074     typedef boost::shared_ptr<receiver_control> sptr;
00075     virtual ~receiver_control() {}
00076 
00077     // get number of available perseus
00078     static size_t get_num_perseus();
00079 
00080     // get product id for perseus
00081     static product_id get_product_id_at(size_t, std::string firmware="perseus.hex");
00082 
00083     // get perseus at a certain index
00084     static sptr make(size_t);
00085 
00086     virtual void init(const boost::property_tree::ptree& config) = 0;
00087 
00088     virtual void   set_sample_rate(int sample_rate) = 0;
00089     virtual int    get_sample_rate() const = 0;
00090 
00091     virtual void   enable_dither(bool) = 0;
00092     virtual void   enable_preamp(bool) = 0;
00093     virtual void   start_async_input(callback::sptr) = 0;
00094     virtual void   stop_async_input() = 0;
00095     virtual void   use_preselector(bool) = 0;
00096     virtual double get_center_frequency_hz() const = 0;
00097     virtual double set_center_freq_hz(double) = 0;
00098     virtual void   set_attenuator(boost::uint8_t) = 0;
00099 
00100   protected:
00101   private:
00102   } ;
00103 } // namespace Perseus
